segments.text: Ella , it's been such a long week . I'm ready to go out and party . Hey , let's go out for a night on the town .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Gosh , you took all the word right out of my mouth . Let's go out and get crazy tonight .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let's go to the new club on West Street .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure , but what do I wear ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You can wear that pretty red dress .
segments.speaker: S1
